item.title: Laptops suck
item.description: Modern laptops are unusable. Spending more than a couple of hours on a laptop leads to neck or back pain. At first, it’s just not comfortable, but then it becomes unbearable. The laptop forces you to hunch over it. You are digital nomad, congrats Your neck, wrists, and back will eventually be hurt. For me, it was the neck. I just have to come up with something or I couldn’t work.
